comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: The relatively short wingspan, shape of the wings and single vertical stabilizer reveal this to actually be an image of a Short Stirling bomber. See three-view of the Short Stirling here for comparison: upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/91/Short_Stirlin... Compare to the three-view of the Handley Page Halifax bomber: upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/b/bd/Handley_Page_...

comment.author: 95711690@N03
comment._content: Thank you very much for this information.  The original photo had the mistaken information written on the back, but judging by the illustrations that you have provided I believe that you are correct.  I will correct the description; thanks again!
